items.name: body
items.description: The HTML for the main body of the accordion item. Not displayed if `text` is set.

items.name: text
items.description:
The text for the accordion item which will be inserted into a `

` element. Overwrites `body` if it is set.

name: group
description: The name of the accordion group. If set, only one item in the named group can be opened at a time.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the accordion.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the accordion.
